pkgmetadata.longdescription: spglib======Python bindings for C library for finding and handling crystalsymmetriesInstallation------------The package is developed on github. You can get the source for thereleased versions from the`repository <https://github.com/spglib/spglib/releases>`__.Using package distribution service~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~The easiest way to install python-spglib is to use the pypi package, forwhich numpy is required to be installed before the installation. Acommand to install spglib is::: pip install spglibConda is another choice::: conda install -c conda-forge spglibThese packages are made by Pawel T. Jochym.
